tool_description: Train search, live train status, etc all train infos related to Indian railways
name: Indian Railway IRCTC
title: Indian Railway IRCTC

api_list.name: Get Train Live Status by train ID
api_list.description:
Get Train Live Status By ID you got while searching trains in get Train By ID API.

before calling this API to get the live train status you need the id of train, which you will get in gettrainId api

api_list.name: Get Train ID from train number
api_list.description:
Get train info by train number.
This is important API to get the live train status you need the id of train, which you will get here

required_parameters.name: trainno
required_parameters.description: trainno can be train number or train name also
